scripts.postinstall: npm run get_git_dependencies && npm run compile_closure_compiler
scripts.get_git_dependencies: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.postget_git_dependencies: cd tools/node.js_closure_compiler_externs/ && git apply ../node.js_closure_compiler_externs_annotation_fixes.patch 2>/dev/null || true && npm install tools/jsonlint/
scripts.compile_closure_compiler: if [ ! -e tools/closure_compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ]; then mvn clean install -DskipTests --file tools/closure_compiler/pom.xml; fi
scripts.lint: if [ $(find src -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then jscs --config src/.jscsrc src/; fi
scripts.compile: if [ $(find src -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then java -jar tools/closure_compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar --flagfile src/.closure_compiler.flagfile --js src/ > /dev/null; fi
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test
